title: Messi's Best Argentina Squad?
description:
The FC crew react to Lionel Messi's brilliant performance in Argentina's 3-0 win over Honduras and argue if this is the PSG forward's best chance at winning a World Cup. Plus, the guys react to Spain's surprise loss to Switzerland and question if Portugal have been flying under the radar heading into the World Cup.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Is this Messi's best chance to win a World Cup?; Spain fall to Switzerland 2-1; Portugal cruise past Czech Republic
